Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 3018.

At the conclusion of debate, the chair put the question on the motion to suspend the rules. Mr. Terry objected to the Yea - Nay vote on the grounds that a quorum was not present. Further proceedings on the motion were postponed. The point of no quorum was withdrawn.

bill.summary: 3/8/2000--Passed House amended. Designates the following U.S. Post Offices in South Carolina located at: (1) 301 Main Street in Eastover as the Layford R. Johnson Post Office; (2) 78 Sycamore Street in Charleston as the Richard E. Fields Post Office; (3) 557 East Bay Street in Charleston as the Marybelle H. Howe Post Office; and (4) 4026 Lamar Street in (the Eau Claire community of) Columbia as the Mamie G. Floyd Post Office.
